#### [citra karisma](https://icc.utm.my/citra-karisma/)

Annual event for prestigious awards and recognition for the best researchers in innovation and commercialisation.

**Director of UTM ICC**
=======================

##### **Assoc. Prof. Ts. Dr. Noor Azurati Ahmad @ Salleh**

❝ Commercialization is the process of  
technology transfer which plays a big part in bringing these ideas from the lab to the market. Government and private organisations provide funding that supports the critical research from which new discoveries are brought about. ICC performs to protect these discoveries and create partnership to help the intellectual properties and assets to be developed into new products. ❞

![](https://research.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2020/10/Dr_Azurati3.png "Dr_Azurati3")

**Innovations**
===============

ICC assists in the filing of new intellectual property resulting from the innovation development as well as facilitating the commercialization strategy of all UTM’s products.

**✎**
-----

**REGISTER**
------------

Filing your new intellectual property with us through our INNOCOMMS system.

**▤**
-----

**LIST OF IP**
--------------

View the full list of our intellectual property registered in INNOCOMMS system.

**◎**
-----

**GUIDELINES**
--------------

Several guidelines regarding the filing of intellectual property are available here.

**Commercialization**
=====================

For more than a decade, ICC has dominated the commercial arena by strengthening its technology transfer model through university subsidiaries as well as spin-off companies formed by its academic entrepreneurs.

**⍐**
-----

**LICENSE**
-----------

Our Innovations are ready for commercial development through technology licensing.

**▩**
-----

**PRODUCTS**
------------

Recent list of UTM products that are ready for commercialization can be found here.

**♟**
-----

**SPIN-OFF**
------------

Exploring our spin-off companies and looking for potential collaborations.

**Technovation Park**
=====================

UTM Technovation Park offers conducive environment for incubation and startup. Here, we provide incubator spaces to encourage the commercialization of R&D culture and expedite the advancement process of new businesses.

**◴**
-----

**INCUBATORS**
--------------

Special incubation programs are designed to speed up the growth and success of your startup companies.

**♠**
-----

**SHOWCASE**
------------

Research products showcase is presented to you for better community-industry-academic engagements.

**♠**
-----

**PROSPECT**
------------

We are visioning something big in the near future – lets be a part of this exciting journey.
